p: Coatings can also serve as carriers of antioxidative substances to protect against discoloration, degradation and oxidative rancidity [ 96]. Table 2 lists antioxidant agents used in alginate-based edible films and coatings. The application of an edible coating with incorporated antioxidants decreases the oxidation successfully due to the gas barrier properties of alginate coating and the synergistic effect between two factors.
